snippet: Martin Davis plunged into a container of hydrofluoric acid when the roof at Swepco Tube in Clifton, N.J., partly collapsed.
abstract: Roofer Martin Davis falls through a partly collapsed roof into a container of hydrofluoric acid at a building in Clifton, NJ, suffering critical injuries.
lead_paragraph: Martin Davis plunged into a container of hydrofluoric acid when the roof at Swepco Tube in Clifton, N.J., partly collapsed.

headline.seo: Roofer in New Jersey Falls Into Vat of Acid
headline.main: New Jersey Roofer Falls Into Acid Vat
headline.print_headline: New Jersey Roofer Falls Into Acid Vat
